entity-permission.name: storage-create
entity-permission.sql: SELECT acl.id FROM acl WHERE acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.user_id = :user_id

entity-permission.name: storage-delete
entity-permission.sql: SELECT acl.id FROM awa_storage INNER JOIN acl ON acl.entity_id = awa_storage.workspace_id WHERE acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.entity_id = :entity_id
